title: Blaze
description: Passion. Love.Forever. Forever is a long time and takes a lot of hard work.For twelve years, Madison and J's love story has been wild and uncontrollable. Their road to love has been full of breathtaking highs and devastating lows. Finally, theyâ€™ve found each other again and have both sworn that this time it will be forever.Theirs is an everlasting love.Or, is it?Can forever be an impossible dream when two people are as headstrong as these two? Or will the deep love they have for each other win out and give them the forever they've fought hard for?
author: Nina Levine
